answers.answer: You just have a drink you have to drink in five minutes then they draw blood nothing too bad except it kinda makes you feel icky for a while
It's doesn't taste as bad as people say either

It taste like flat pop or like a real sugary coolaid. Its not that bad. Mine was cold tho some drs will give it to you warm. And you will either have a red drink or an.orage one. I had the red. And yes you do have to drink it in 5 mins, then they will take your blood an hour after you drink it. I felt like i had a sugar rush after i drank mine. And it upset my stomach a little bit because of how fast i had to drink it

I had to fast for 12hours, have a blood test, drink the drink they give you in 3mins, wait an hour, have a blood test, wait another hour then have another blood test. The only thing I will say is bring something to entertain yourself with as I had to wait at the doctors the whole time I was incredibly bored. Also make sure you are wearing comfortable clothing and maybe bring a small pillow as again I had to wait in the doctors the whole time and I was extremely uncomfortable.
Thank you. I am rather terrified of needles but I'm sure it won't be bad :)

Get used to the needles...shots...etc. they'll be pricking u  throughout the whole pregnancy!  And when that pain of labor starts you'll prob be begging them to prick u! Unless u choose natural. Good luck!
I actually had to take the test today. The drink made me pretty nauseous I would ask if you can have anything to eat before. My doctor said I could eat toast or crackers so I wouldn't get sick.
I wasnt aloud to eat anything for 12 hours either.
The red drink tastes like the red Hawaiian punch. It was a actually really good. Lol
I had the red drink it wasn't too terrible but I got the world's worst acid reflux from it :/ and my stomach is yucky feeling :/but they took blood and I find out in 2 days If I passed or not

I have to take that soon too. I have the orange drink. It's waiting for me in the fridge Lol my doctor said I could have some eggs and water before the test. Im kinda nervous. And the drink looks gross :/
How far was everyone when they had to drink the drink? I am almost 23 weeks and my next ob appointment is next week. Should I get the drink then or a few weeks later?
They haven't given me the drink yet. They haven't said when they would but I take the test the first week of January.

question: Hi ladies I am getting tested for gestational diabetes in about 3 weeks. I am a little nervous about it and just want to know what to expect.
title: gestational diabetes
